content: this is a crochet pattern for a balloon gift keychain compromised of the balloon and the gift+bow this pdf contains the written pattern for the balloon and gift as well as photo tutorials for any tricky parts you may encounter while creating this keychain recommended skill level beginner-intermediate stitches used slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet chain techniques magic_ring invisible decrease working in back loops only joining body parts together sewing on details materials used 2mm hook tapestry or sewing needle stuffing stitch markers scissors/thread cutter 2 5-3 5 yarn white red chain links ~6mm keychain please feel free to message me with any questions you might have
